          <title>
            <string language="en">Mechanism of an electric motor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einheit eines Elektromotors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mécanisme d'un moteur électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mecanismo de um motor elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Meccanismo di un motore elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μηχανισμός μιας ηλεκτρικής μηχανής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mecanismo de un motor eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations shows a device that can reverse the current in the armature of an electric motor as it turns. This device prevents the wires from the power supply to get twisted.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">axle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric motor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graphite brush</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">permanent magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reverse current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south-seeking pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">split ring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Abbildungen zeigt eine Einheit, 
die den Strom in der Armatur eines Elektromotors aufheben kann, 
während er sich dreht. Diese Einheit verhindert die Leitungen 
am Spg.Versorgungsteil, um verdreht zu erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tiers de trois illustrations montre un 
dispositif qui peut renverser le courant dans l'armature d'un moteur 
électrique pendant qu'il tourne. Ce dispositif empêche les 
fils de l'alimentation d'énergie pour obtenir tordu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de três ilustrações mostra um 
dispositivo que possa inverter a corrente na armadura de um motor 
elétrico enquanto gira. Este dispositivo impede os fios da 
fonte de alimentação para começar torcido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre illustrazioni mostra un 
dispositivo che può invertire la corrente nell'armatura di un motore 
elettrico mentre gira. Questo dispositivo impedisce i legare il 
gruppo di alimentazione per ottenere torto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων εμφανίζει μια συσκευή που
μπορεί να αντιστρέψει το ρεύμα armature μιας ηλεκτρικής 
μηχανής καθώς γυρίζει. Αυτή η συσκευή αποτρέπει τα 
καλώδια από την παροχή ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος που παίρνει 
στριμμένη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de tres ilustraciones muestra un 
dispositivo que pueda invertir la corriente en la armadura de un motor
eléctrico mientras que da vuelta. Este dispositivo previene los
alambres de la fuente de alimentación para conseguir torcido.</string>
          </description>
